abstract.p: List of some recent residential resale prices in New York City and metropolitan area; photos; mortgage rate graph (S)

block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
MANHATTAN

GREENWICH VILLAGE 791 Greenwich Street (12th Street) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 870-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; windowed kitchen, 9-ft. ceilings, h/w floors, fireplace, west exposure; maintenance $723, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $349,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

UPPER EAST SIDE 333 East 69th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,150-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, h/w floors, balcony, south exposure, common roof deck; maintenance $1,093, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $489,000, 17 weeks on market (Brokers: Halstead Property Co.; Sotheby's International)

UPPER WEST SIDE 724 West End Avenue (105th Street) (Clebourne) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,650-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, 10-ft. ceilings, h/w floors, 2 exposures, original moldings and detail; maintenance $1,326, 40% tax-deductible; listed at $775,000 (multiple bids), 12 weeks on market (Brokers: Wohfarth & Associates; Bellmarc)

WEST SIDE 150 Columbus Avenue (67th Street) (1 Lincoln Square) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,438-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors, c/a; common charge $902; taxes $5,028; listed at $985,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)
BRONX

CITY ISLAND 89 Reynold Street 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 20-year-old brick contemporary; dining room, eat-in kitchen, h/w floors, finished basement, rear deck, pool, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,700; listed at $375,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Jacqueline Kyle Kall)
BROOKLYN

DITMAS PARK AREA 789 East 17th Street 7-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 95-year-old Victorian; dining room, eat-in kitchen, library, 2-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,400; listed at $599,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Wilk Real Estate)

PARK SLOPE 163 Prospect Park West 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,900-sq.-ft. duplex condo in a prewar building; dining room, eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, h/w floors; common charge $390; taxes $2,640; listed at $525,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Frederick Palmer Real Estate)

WINDSOR TERRACE 279 Prospect Park West 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,846-sq.-ft. duplex condo in a recently renovated prewar building; h/w floors, skylights, kitchen with dishwasher, fireplace, washer/dryer, 480-sq.-ft. private roof deck, common gardens; common charge $269; taxes 100% abated; listed at $310,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)
QUEENS

FOREST HILLS 71-37 Loubet Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 55-year-old detached wood-frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, 1-car garage, 30-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,900; listed at $379,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Kingdom Realty)

FOREST HILLS GARDENS 4 Dartmouth Street (Tennis View) 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; dining room, windowed eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, h/w floors, 2 exposures; maintenance $784, 48% tax-deductible; listed at $259,000, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Sarah Jones Real Estate)

HOLLISWOOD 86-70 Sancho Street 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 65-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, sun room, fireplace, h/w floors, 1-car garage, 36-by-118-ft. lot; taxes $2,162; listed at $379,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Goller & Costi)
STATEN ISLAND

WILLOWBROOK 275 Mann Avenue 2-family, 65-year-old detached wood-frame house; 3 bedrooms, 2 baths in primary unit; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, dining room in other; eat-in kitchens in each; semifinished basement, 2-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,037; listed at $279,900, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Kingsley)
WESTCHESTER

BRONXVILLE 5 Lookout Avenue 6-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 104-year-old Tudor; study, granite and cherrywood bar, sun room, dining room, modern eat-in kitchen, detached 1-car garage, 1/4-acre lot; taxes $16,336; listed at $1.495 million; 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; Bronxville-Ley)

EASTCHESTER 143 Garth Road 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 750-sq.-ft. co-op in a 71-year-old building ; entry hall, living room, modern eat-in kitchen, elevator, storage room; maintenance $488, 66% tax-deductible; listed at $100,000 (multiple bids); 17 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; Houlihan/Lawrence)

HARTSDALE 25 Shaw Place 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 45-year-old split-level; dining room, deck, den, storage area, laundry area, above-ground pool, 0.41-acre lot on a cul-de-sac; taxes $7,582; listed at $339,000; 13 weeks on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)

MOUNT VERNON 12 Pondfield Parkway 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 72-year-old brick Tudor; fireplace, French doors, porch, dining room, breakfast room, maid's room, family room; 1/4-acre lot; taxes $9,847; listed at $575,000; 28 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Ragette)
LONG ISLAND

MINEOLA 180 Andrews Road 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 65-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, fireplace, 2-car garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,600; listed at $310,000, 3 days on market (Brokers: Atanas; Soisson)

SMITHTOWN 1 Pond Path Court 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 37-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, basement, fireplace, 2-car garage, 1-acre lot; taxes $8,000; listed at $449,890, 7 days on market (Broker: Prudential Long Island Realty)

WANTAGH 3614 De Mott Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 42-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, basement, 1-car garage, 60-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $5,400; listed at $245,000 (multiple bids), 6 weeks on market (Broker: Manor Gate)
CONNECTICUT

DANBURY 6 Spruce Mountain Trail 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 43-year-old split-level; dining room, remodeled eat-in kitchen with pantry, home office, master bath with whirlpool, rear deck, 1-car garage, 1.13-acre lot; taxes $3,543; listed at $244,000 (multiple bids), 5 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut Realty)

NORWALK 11 Princes Pine Road 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 46-year-old contemporary; dining room, eat-in kitchen, laundry and storage room, 0.58-acre lot with frontage on Florsheim Pond; taxes $3,330; listed at $289,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Brokers: William Raveis; Realty Seven)

RIVERSIDE 21 Willowmere Avenue 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 63-year-old colonial renovated in 1998; dining room, den, fireplace, French doors, screened porch, h/w floors, 2-car garage, 0.29-acre lot; taxes $5,787; listed at $1.095 million, 10 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt Real Estate; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)

STRATFORD 45 Pasadena Avenue 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 28-year-old ranch; living room, h/w floors, fireplace, 2 double closets, 2-car garage, 0.17-acre lot; taxes $3,257; listed at $163,000, 3 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt Real Estate; Coldwell Banker/Gold Coast)
NEW JERSEY

BAYONNE 22 East 46th Street 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 39-year-old colonial; h/w floors, eat-in kitchen, 2 parking spaces, w/w carpeting, 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,870; listed at $179,900, (multiple bids), 5 months on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)

GLEN ROCK 253 Glen Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 55-year-old Cape Cod; living room with fireplace, den, deck, full finished basement, 1-car garage, 70-by-140-ft. lot; taxes $6,864; listed at $269,000, 45 days on market (Broker: Weichert Realtors)

RAMSEY 4 Collette Drive 5-bedroom, 3-bath, 19-year-old colonial, 3-car garage, c/a, deck, security system, 0.66-acre corner lot; taxes $12,601; listed at $749,000, 2 months on market (Brokers: Abbott & Caserta; Coldwell Banker)
